roleset.name: rave, launch into a diatribe

example.name: 'for' phrase in this case = arg3
example.text: She feels she 's showing love by bringing him to death s door because he asked for -LRB- or begged or ranted -RRB- for *RNR*-1 food-1 .

example.name: arg1 as complement clause
example.text: i showed her this and she ranted that she looked like she had no chin
example.arg: that she looked like she had no chin

example.name: standard arg3
example.text: Anne ranted about the bad service she had received at the store.
example.arg: about the bad service she had received at the store

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Member of VNcls lecture-37.11-1, manner_speaking-37.3.
